Hey All -

At the end of 2025, BDL made the difficult position to not do business in 2026. I had the opportunity to run the education team at an AI company, and decided it was the right move for me.

What does that mean? I still have the course I built and I am more than happy to share it with you, though I would not be able to deliver due to my new commitment.

Sarah Nell-Rodriguez

tasks.name: HeartCap Phase 1: Create Supabase Project
tasks.description:
[01/27/2026 14:16] ğŸ“¥ Task created

Create production Supabase project for HeartCap-Recruiter.

**Steps:**
1. Go to supabase.com, create new project
2. Note Project URL, anon key, service role key
3. Run the 3 migration SQL files from supabase/migrations/
4. Verify tables created with RLS policies

**Reference:** brain/projects/heartcap-deployment-prep.md
